description: Returns the resource counts across accounts and regions that are present in your Config aggregator. You can request the resource counts by providing filters and GroupByKey. For example, if the input contains accountID 12345678910 and region us-east-1 in filters, the API returns the count of resources in account ID 12345678910 and region us-east-1. If the input contains ACCOUNT_ID as a GroupByKey, the API returns resource counts for all source accounts that are present in your aggregator.

parameters.name: ConfigurationAggregatorName
parameters.description: The name of the configuration aggregator.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters the results based on the ResourceCountFilters object. ResourceType (string) --- The type of the Amazon Web Services resource. AccountId (string) --- The 12-digit ID of the account. Region (string) --- The region where the account is located.

nested_params.name: ResourceType
nested_params.description: The type of the Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_params.name: Region
nested_params.description: The region where the account is located.

nested_items.name: TotalDiscoveredResources
nested_items.description: The total number of resources that are present in an aggregator with the filters that you provide.

nested_items.name: GroupByKey
nested_items.description: The key passed into the request object. If GroupByKey is not provided, the result will be empty.

nested_items.name: GroupedResourceCounts
nested_items.description: Returns a list of GroupedResourceCount objects.

nested_items.name: GroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the group that can be region, account ID, or resource type. For example, region1, region2 if the region was chosen as GroupByKey.

nested_items.name: ResourceCount
nested_items.description: The number of resources in the group.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken string returned on a previous page that you use to get the next page of results in a paginated response.
